summary: The Financial Technology Protection Act of 2025 establishes an Independent Financial Technology Working Group to combat terrorism and illicit financing. The Working Group, composed of representatives from various government agencies and private sector experts, will research the use of digital assets and emerging technologies in illicit activities and develop legislative and regulatory proposals to counter such threats. The bill also mandates a report and strategy from the President on the illicit use of digital assets to evade sanctions. The Working Group will submit regular reports to Congress on its findings and recommendations.
